acquire(TableInterface) - Method in class com.worxforus.db.ConnectionLimitHelper
 
acquireConnection(Context, String, TableInterface) - Static method in class com.worxforus.db.TableManager
This function verifies that the table has been created and that the upgrade modifications have been performed on it Then it locks the table for use Use: releaseConnection(table) when finished performing operations on the table
activateStrictMode() - Static method in class com.worxforus.Utils
This activates the android strict mode for platforms that have access to it.

attach(Context) - Method in interface com.worxforus.Command
 
authenticate(String, NetAuthentication.NetAuthenticationHelper) - Static method in class com.worxforus.net.NetAuthentication
Use this function after calling loadUsername and loadPassword Run inside a separate thread using Runnable or ASyncTask since the network calls may block for a while The NetHelper interface is used to attempt access multiple retries if needed.
AuthNetHandler - Class in com.worxforus.net
This is the net handler to handle authenticated requests to/from the network with automatic login attempts.
AuthNetHandler() - Constructor for class com.worxforus.net.AuthNetHandler
